responses: Hi there, how can I help?
SOSC is an Open source Community of Sahyadri College Of Engineering, it's a conglomeration of different coding clubs in our college, take a look at our About section of our website :)
There are many clubs in SOSC like Developer Student Club, Mozilla Club, Open-Source Women's Commnunity etc you can join any club of your choice :)
You can join a plethora of clubs in our community!, take a look at our clubs page

patterns: do I need coding skills to join sosc
who can I talk to about joining sosc
responses: Anybody with the a will to learn and contribute to commnuity can join SOSC
You can choose the club of your choice and approach our core-team members
You can talk to our community leads and directly talk to us. Check out our members page to talk to our Core Team :)
